  • projects
    • email

    I'm a designer in Baltimore pursuing a BFA at MICA while working part time at Friends of the Web.

    My process is interdisciplinary, speculative and theory-driven while also having the rigor of thoughtful user experience. I'm interested in how long-established disciplines (e.g. architecture or woodworking) can inform designing on a screen. Buildings are a lot like websites.

    People keep telling me that I like piles.

    Things I'm reading:

    • Collection of Sand
    • The Poetics of Space
    • The Art of Looking Sideways

    Contact me:

    • email: info@trevorcarr.info
    • twitter: @trevorsee
